class.name: DiscordCallInfoHandle
class.brief_description: <para>Convenience class that represents the state of a single Discord call in a lobby. </para>

method.name: channel_id
method.description: <para>Returns the lobby ID of the call. </para>

method.name: get_participants
method.description: <para>Returns a list of the user IDs of the participants in the call. </para>

method.name: get_voice_state_handle
method.description: <para>Accesses the voice state for a single user so you can know if they have muted or deafened themselves. </para>

method.name: guild_id
method.description: <para>Returns the lobby ID of the call. </para>
